column4: GM CEO expects Tesla to be around in the next 10 years
column5: General Motors Co's  Chief Executive Officer Mary Barra said on Thursday she expects Tesla Inc  to be around in the next 10 years  despite the electric carmaker's troubles with turning around its operations.
